com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.event

Class SerialDataEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.event.PTalkEvent
        • com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.event.SerialDataEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SerialDataEvent
extends PTalkEvent
    Created by cory on 4/7/2016. This event encapsulates a packet being sent by this host (master) or send my the target acceptor (slave)
    See Also:
